faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our AI Masterclass programs

questions.question: What prerequisites do I need for the AI courses?
questions.answer: Our courses are designed to accommodate various skill levels. While basic programming knowledge is helpful, it's not mandatory for the introductory modules. We provide additional resources and support to help you build any necessary foundational skills.

questions.question: How long do I have access to the course materials?
questions.answer: Individual courses include 3 months of access, while bundle packages provide 6 months of access. Enterprise clients can arrange custom access periods. All course materials and updates during your access period are included.

questions.question: Are the courses self-paced or scheduled?
questions.answer: Our courses offer a flexible hybrid approach. While the core content is self-paced, we have weekly live sessions, office hours, and project deadlines to help maintain momentum and engagement. You can adjust the pace to fit your schedule while staying on track.

questions.question: What kind of support is available during the course?
questions.answer: We provide comprehensive support including live Q&A sessions with Professor Voss, dedicated teaching assistants, an active community forum, and weekly office hours. Enterprise clients receive additional dedicated support channels.

questions.question: Do you offer job placement assistance?
questions.answer: Yes! We have a 92% job placement rate within 6 months of course completion. Our career support includes resume reviews, interview preparation, networking events, and direct connections to our hiring partners in the AI industry.

questions.question: Can I switch between courses in the bundle package?
questions.answer: Absolutely! Bundle package participants can freely move between all three courses during their access period, allowing you to learn at your own pace and focus on the areas most relevant to your goals.
